actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet

official_title: To extend the expiration date of coupons issued under the digital television converter box program.

summary.text: Digital Television Coupon Improvement Act - Amends the Digital Television Transition and Public Safety Act of 2005 to require that coupons that can be applied toward the purchase of digital-to-analog converter boxes expire at the close of March 31, 2009. Applies the change to coupons issued after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To extend the expiration date of coupons issued under the digital television converter box program.
